name: SideBar 2
short_description:
This software is meant to provide the users with facilities to speed up work and make computing easier.This version of SideBar is specially optimized for Windows 7 and above
GENERAL FEATURES:- 
1. Simple UI Design :  User-Interface design has been made more simple and powerful than earlier verison. 

2. MOST OFTEN OPTIONS: SideBar 2 has been developed keeping in mind the different types of users and the most often demand from a common user to a advance user
3.It arranges the options and classifies them on the functional basis and gives a more easier way to access the options quickly 
4.SMALL SIZE 
5. USER FRIENDLY
6. TECHNICAL : Though Sidebar is .NET based software optimized for Windows 7, thanks to old computer users that Sidebar uses .NET Framework v1.1 so that old computers of 2000's may run it but for Windows XP , there is doubt( not tested)

7.100% Bugless
summary: Makes your computing more easier than ever and secures ur system
